title: Implicit int for untyped consts/vars contradicts spec
body:
by **itmitica**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Declare an untyped constant, ranging outside int32's limits
2. Declare an untyped variable based on an untyped constant, ranging outside
int(int32)'s limits
3. http://play.golang.org/p/QOp1qs7M8Q



What is the expected output?
A new constant, or a new variable

What do you see instead?
An int(int32) overflow error


Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go 1.0.3

http://golang.org/ref/spec#Constants
Numeric constants represent values of arbitrary precision and do not overflow.
